attributes.action: Cancel the Olympic Games and give to another country.  Give the money to....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
public services, NHS, first time house buying etc and help build Britain...
Illigal immigration will be rife and the country is overflowing to boiling point as it is.
Also if the millenieum dome is anything to go by it will be a disaster.  The people do not want it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
